model.comment: Fits Atlas N Scale: B23-7, B30-7, B36-7, C628, C630, Dash8-32BW, Dash8-40B, Dash8-40BW and GP-38. Fits Atlas DCC Ready: GP-40, GP-40-2, SD-7, SD-9, SD-35, Trainmaster and U25B

variable.label: Consist Address Active For Yellow

variable.tooltip: Values above 128 increase adjustment, below 128 decrease adjustment

variable.tooltip: Values above 128 increase adjustment, below 128 decrease adjustment
variable.label: Consist Deceleration Adjustment

factReset.label: Reset All CVs
Reset delle CV ai valori di fabbrica

label.text: If Accel 2, 3 and Decel 2, 3 are all zero, base rates applies to whole speed range
Tip: you must set CV15 equal to this number to unlock the decoder for programming
Values above 128 increase speed. Values below 128 decrease speed
